options.name: Camiral Hotel (on-site)
options.notes: On-site at Camiral Golf & Wellness. Walking distance to Stadium Course. Premium — expect R7K+/night per room during Ryder Cup week.
options.pros: Zero commute, golf on doorstep, spa
options.cons: Most expensive option, will book out fast

options.name: Villa — Caldes de Malavella
options.notes: Shared villa for 7, 10-15 min drive to course. Thermal baths nearby. ~€250-350/night total split 7 ways.
options.pros: Best value, kitchen, pool likely, group vibe
options.cons: Need car hire, less walking-distance convenience

options.name: Hotel Balneari Vichy Catalan
options.notes: 4-star thermal spa hotel in Caldes de Malavella. 10 min from course. Historic building.
options.pros: Thermal spa included, close to venue, good mid-range
options.cons: May book out for Ryder Cup, limited rooms

options.name: Hotel in Girona Old Town
options.notes: Girona old town. Great restaurants and bars. ~25 min drive to course.

options.name: Barcelona + Day Trips
options.notes: Stay in Barcelona, ~75 min drive/train. Better for pre/post-event days.
options.cons: 75 min commute to course, tolls, fuel, exhausting
